title: Navigate forwards into a radio group where no radio buttons are checked
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Regular crust' radio button.
assertions: roleGroup nameGroupPizzaCrust roleRadio nameRegularCrust stateRadioUnchecked positionRadio1 numberRadioButtonsGroup3 0:interactionModeEnabled

title: Navigate backwards into a radio group where no radio buttons are checked
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Thin crust' radio button.
assertions: roleGroup nameGroupPizzaCrust roleRadio nameThinCrust 0:nameRegularCrust stateRadioUnchecked positionRadio3 0:positionRadio1 numberRadioButtonsGroup3 0:interactionModeEnabled

title: Navigate forwards into a radio group where the first radio button is checked
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Regular crust' radio button.
assertions: roleGroup nameGroupPizzaCrust roleRadio nameRegularCrust stateRadioChecked positionRadio1 numberRadioButtonsGroup3

title: Navigate backwards into a radio group where the last radio button is checked
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Thin crust' radio button.
assertions: roleGroup nameGroupPizzaCrust roleRadio nameThinCrust stateRadioChecked positionRadio3 numberRadioButtonsGroup3

title: Navigate forwards within a radio group to an unchecked radio button
instructions: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Deep dish' radio button.

title: Navigate backwards within a radio group to an unchecked radio button
instructions: Starting at the 'Deep dish' radio button, navigate to the 'Regular crust' radio button.

title: Navigate forwards within a radio group to a checked radio button
instructions: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Deep dish' radio button.

title: Navigate backwards within a radio group to a checked radio button
instructions: Starting at the 'Deep dish' radio button, navigate to the 'Regular crust' radio button.

title: Navigate forwards from the last to the first radio button in a group
instructions: Starting at the 'Thin crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Regular crust' radio button.

title: Navigate backwards from the first to the last radio button  in a group
instructions: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Thin crust' radio button.

title: Navigate out of the start of a radio group
instructions: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Navigate forwards from here' link.

title: Navigate out of the end of a radio group
instructions: Starting at the 'Thin crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Navigate backwards from here' link.

title: Request information about an unchecked radio button
instructions: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, read information about the radio button.

title: Request information about a checked radio button
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Regular crust' radio button, read information about the radio button.

title: Check a radio button
instructions: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, check the radio button.
